description.narrative: Output 1 .1: By 2018, targeted health facilities offer a comprehensive evidence based packages of high impact quality preventive, promotional and curative interventions for maternal, neonatal, child and adolescent health and support improved demand for services

sector.narrative: Community and home based maternal and newborn care
Facility based maternal and newborn care (including emergency obstetric and newborn care, quality improvement)
HSS - Health sector policy, planning and governance at national or sub-national levels
IMNCI / Integrated Community Case Management (iCCM) - Community
Immunization supply chain, including cold chain
Maternal and newborn care policy advocacy, evidence generation, national / subnational capacity development

title.narrative: Niger United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Niger Country Programme Document 2014-2018 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2018 Niger: Evaluation des cliniques mobiles dans la région de Diffa
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 1 .1: By 2018, targeted health facilities offer a comprehensive evidence based packages of high impact quality preventive, promotional and curative interventions for maternal, neonatal, child and adolescent health and support improved demand for services

description.narrative: Seasonal malaria chemoprevention reached more than 4,000,980 children nationwide. The management of possible severe bacterial infection in young infant was launched by the Ministry of Health. The newborn resuscitation block built and equipped in Maradi and Zinder and 286 low weight and preterm babies received Kangaroo mothers care. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2019

title.narrative: % of children under 5 years of age who benefited from a 3rd dose of seasonal malaria chemoprophylaxis in the 35 Convergence Municipalities (Comdeco)
Health workers in UNICEF supported programmes trained in Rapid Diagnostic Testing for malaria in children
Primary Health Care facilities providing clinical care to children under five using the IMNCI approach
% of pregnant women benefiting from IPT2 as part of ANC in districts containing convergence municipalities (with particular attention on adolescents)
(NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) Proportion of facilities offering delivery services that have guidelines for essential childbirth care (observed in the service area where relevant)
(NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) Percentage of health facilities offering delivery services with functional newborn resuscitation equipment (functional bag and mask in neonatal size)
% of CSIs in convergence municipalities offering the minimum package of high impact interventions for reducing mortality in children under 5 years of age
% of CSI in convergence municipalities offering basic emergency obstetric and neonatal care (SONUB), equiped with tables and equipment for newborn
Policy on Focused Antenatal Care has been developed, adopted and implemented
